abstract: Facebook said it had passed an important financial milestone and become cash-flow positive. The service now has 300 million members.
snippet: Facebook said it had passed an important financial milestone and become cash-flow positive. The service now has 300 million members.
lead_paragraph: Update | 3:29 p.m. Fixed to reflect that Facebook says its cash flow does cover capital expenditures.

headline.main: Facebook Says Its Finances Are Looking Up
